name: mens ring with engraving
description:
This is a solid sterling silver 7.5mm wide & 1.6mm thick mens band,
The centre of the ring is a brushed matte finish.


The band is slighly half rounded, and has two deep
grooves all the way around the band.

This band is also "comfy fit" meaning, the inside edges of the ring are lightly filed away, making it extremely comfortable to wear.

ENGRAVING:
This listing includes engraving for 1-5 words - done in cursive on the inside of the band.
If you do not want engraving - contact me for a custom listing, the price would then be $87 without engraving.

This ring is made to order.
Please allow up to 8 days before postage.

Please leave finger size & message/words to be engraved in Message to seller at checkout,
or email, hellothula@gmail.com

Thank-you for viewing.

All thula jewellery comes gift wrapped.

name: dove necklace
description:
This is a solid sterling silver dove necklace,
The rectangular part of the necklace is 13mm x 10mm

There is a small flying dove inside the rectangular frame, with a coral (peachy pinky colour) enamel surrounding it.

The chain is extra length solid sterling silver chain - the necklace measures 75cm in total length (29.5 inches)


Lead time on this item : 7-10 days before postage.

Thula. Quality. Handmade. ♥

name: monogram initial ring
description:
The Perfect gift - to yourself, a loved one or to your bridesmaids ♥

This is a sterling silver Monogram initial ring,
The band measures 2.1mm wide, & the circle measures 10.5mm in diameter.

This ring is engraved with your initial of choice, please see second picture for initial samples. - if you'd prefer something a little different, I do offer another style of engraving - in lowercase, please see my shop for the other inital ring.

Please leave finger size & initial to be engraved in 'message to seller' at checkout or via email after purchasing ; hellothula@gmail.com

Lead time before postage : 5-7 days
Postage : courier to nearest post office counter, overnight delivery.


♥ quality. handmade

name: triangle stud earrings
description:
Triangle studs ♥

I just love the simplicity of these studs but yet the shape makes them so interesting..
You just got to love triangles!

There are solid sterling silver studs & they come with solid sterling silver butterflies.

Measurements :
9 x 6mm

2 options for the finished :
1. Matte (which is what the listings images show)
2. Highly polished (shiny)

-leave which you'd prefer in message to seller at checkout or via email ; hellothula@gmail.com

Standard thickness sterling silver pins

name: pattern ring
description:
This is a solid sterling silver ring, it has a beautiful & elegant flowing flower& leaf pattern,
with lines & a detailed design all the way around the band.

The inside, & sides of this band are a sanded finish. The top, of the ring - which features the pattern is lightly polished to highlight the pattern - making it eye catching at every angle.

This band measures 3mm wide, & is 1.3mm thick.

This ring is made with quality, & durability in mind.


-Made to your finger size
All thula jewelry comes securely, & beautifully gift wrapped.

♥Thank-you for viewing
hellothula@gmail.com

name: 9 sets of cufflinks for Jennifer
description:
9 sets of cufflinks for Jennifer

Each set to have     HEX    engraved in cursive.

Silver Plated backings attached to sterling silver face.


Production time  : two to three weeks before postage from date of payment.

Tracking number will be provided.
POSTAGE TIME : 3-6 Days

Boxes will be provided.

name: clover ring Style B
description:
This is a sterling silver clover ring.

This ring is completely handmade by myself with quality & craftmanship being the main focus.

I offer two styles of this ring,
one (style A) with the clover on a plate inside the hexagon, and oxidising between the clover and the hexagon.

Style B is without a plate behind the clover,
and without oxidising. The clover is suspended inside the hexagon without a back plate.

This is a solid ring, it is not hollow.

This ring is made to order,
Please send me a message at checkout with finger size or email me, with your finger size after purchasing.

*All thula jewelry comes beautifully gift wrapped.

Please note, that due to the complexity and time taken to maintain a high level of craftmanship in terms of the making up of this ring, aswell as the popularity of this ring - my lead time is a maximum of 7days, usually 3-5 days. 

Thank-you for looking.



Don't know your finger size? Work out your finger size from an existing ring you have :
http://www.onlineconversion.com/ring_size.htm

name: engraved initials cufflinks
description:
Elegant personalized sterling silver cufflinks. A gift to treasure for a lifetime.

The cufflinks measure 11mm square, they are solid sterling silver with sterling silver cufflink backings.

The initials are engraved in a cursive font.

Please let me know what initials must be engraved after purchasing. hellothula@gmail.com

--Should you be wanting more than one set -- please email me and we can discuss a discount -- I will need to set up a special listing on my bigcartel store for you to purchase. email : hellothula@gmail.com

-DHL courier available

Thank-you for viewing ♥

Please allow up to 7 days before postage.

name: monogram initial necklace
description:

name: tear drop earrings
description:
These are sterling silver earrings,

They feature two rounded silver tear drop shape silver pieces which have been soldered together.

The bottom tear is birds nest textured, & the top tear is highly polished.


Measurements
47mm in total length.
Widest point : 14mm.

The hooks are a standard thickness.

The tears are attached to a link and then sterling silver hooks allowing movement.

♥These earrings are made to order.

Please allow a maximum of 5 days before postage.

Thank you for viewing ♥

name: white topaz eternity necklace
description:
This is a sterling silver pendant, made up of two never ending circles.

The center circle/ tube features a beautiful 6mm genuine white topaz, the stone is bezel set into the center circle/ tube.

The v-piece is attached to a link/ or hoop at the top of the outside circle. The link allows movement of the pendant.

The bigger circle measures : 13.5mm (accross the center)

This item includes a solid sterling silver chain, which is 50cm (19.6 inches.) long.

Please allow up to 5 days before postage.

This necklace is made with quality, workmanship & durability in mind.

All thula jewelry comes securely, and beautifully gift wrapped.

Thank-you for viewing.

name: biwa pearl ring
description:
--Biwa pearl ring--

18-20mm creamy white freshwater biwa/ stick pearl set in a solid sterling silver ring.

This pearl is set in a bezel/ or tube setting.
The band is 2.2mm wide.

Please allow 3-7 days before shipping.

This ring is made to your finger size - please send me your finger size in message to seller at checkout, or via conversations.

Each ring is made with a unique freshwater pearl. they are all roughly the same size and rough shape.

Please email me your finger size after checking out.


Don't know your finger size? Work out your finger size from an existing ring you have :
